examples: he had a sharp crease in his trousers

definition: the personal outfit of a bride; clothes and accessories and linens
name: trousseau

definition: flesh of any of several primarily freshwater game and food fishes
name: trout

definition: any of various game and food fishes of cool fresh waters mostly smaller than typical salmons
name: trout

definition: eastern North American dogtooth having solitary yellow flowers marked with brown or purple and spotted interiors
name: trout lily

definition: treasure of unknown ownership found hidden (usually in the earth)
name: trove

definition: a small hand tool with a handle and flat metal blade; used for scooping or spreading plaster or similar materials
name: trowel

definition: use a trowel on; for light garden work or plaster work
name: trowel

definition: an ancient city in Asia Minor that was the site of the Trojan War
name: Troy

definition: a system of weights used for precious metals and gemstones; based on a 12-ounce pound and an ounce of 480 grains
name: troy

definition: a unit of apothecary weight equal to 480 grains or one twelfth of a troy pound
name: troy ounce

definition: an apothecary weight equal to 12 ounces or 373.242 grams
name: troy pound
